Articles.Content:
Look like I have to relearn everything all over start again. I didn't play this game for like 2 year now. I remember I used to going mun and minium many time. I even remember went to Duna once or twice. I even build a Massive station know as OASIS. But I forget most of thing how to play and how build rocket for mun. So I though to relearn start with build this mini station.

![screenshot1_zpszwtnkpec.png](http://i1310.photobucket.com/albums/s652/Deaf3279/screenshot1_zpszwtnkpec.png)
And a fine little station it is!

There are people are having trouble reaching orbit after updating from 0.90 to 1.0, so jumping forward two years worth of versions and immediately building a station is no small feat

Seems like you're having fun though, good luck!
It's Beautiful...
I found the same thing, went from .24 to 1.0 haha and its super different. Loving it though.
After 2 years worth of break you show us that beauty? You sir, are a very talented space engineer ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thank for kind of words but I know it's not true just make me happy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) If it's True. Thank you... Let me see if I could figure how to build to send mun again mmmm

But I found this very oldest picture that I build other kind of station - 

[![Wallpaper01_zps4abca11a.png](http://i1312.photobucket.com/albums/t530/earl_patterson1/KSP/Wallpaper01_zps4abca11a.png)](http://s1312.photobucket.com/user/earl_patterson1/media/KSP/Wallpaper01_zps4abca11a.png.html)

Maybe I can rebuild it with more better... Let me see what mod I should get this time...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T06:43:09Z" title="04/29/2015 06:43  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by Deaf3279**

Oh, it's very true, and I second it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

As for getting (re)started--stock tutorials will not help much, but tutorials written for FAR will.

I decide to not scrap currently station. I decide expand station as I go. Til recently unbelievable accident has happen! I have M700 Survey Scanner orbit polar at 100 km as same station is at orbit 100 km (not polar) What was odd chance of both them run into each other? Very SLIM! And My accident has happened!

As you can see orbit Satellite and Station in same path. 

[![screenshot11_zpsvb84eucz.png](http://i1310.photobucket.com/albums/s652/Deaf3279/screenshot11_zpsvb84eucz.png)](http://s1310.photobucket.com/user/Deaf3279/media/screenshot11_zpsvb84eucz.png.html)

And this unbelievable accident!

[![screenshot23_zps7amhc0ml.png](http://i1310.photobucket.com/albums/s652/Deaf3279/screenshot23_zps7amhc0ml.png)](http://s1310.photobucket.com/user/Deaf3279/media/screenshot23_zps7amhc0ml.png.html)

I'm not going hit Revert Flight. I'm going leave it as it is damaged. Right now I'm doing rebuild solar panel. New design and much bigger (with stock)

Your stations are far nicer than anything I've built!

Also your accident is one I've tried to make happen, but never could.

That's some great timing you had there.

Even broken I like your design ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Can we please ban photobucket from the forums?

Why? Because this will be easier than convincing the admin at work to not block it. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

And: Welcome back! You picked a good time to relearn everything - like mostly everyone else has to too! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Can we please ban photobucket from the forums?
> Why? Because this will be easier than convincing the admin at work to not block it. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Well, What can I say? "Too bad"? Because, When I clicked image icon. It asked me for URL. I only know photobucket will give me url. I don't even have personal website to storage my image at. So, I'll keep use photobucket site til then.

As station repair underway. First thing I wanted install truss with solar before i deploy them. Make sure everything has put together as this...

![screenshot25_zpsmjs76xdr.png](http://i1310.photobucket.com/albums/s652/Deaf3279/screenshot25_zpsmjs76xdr.png)

Then deploy the solar panel. It turn out really look great!

![screenshot26_zpsrjw6p54f.png](http://i1310.photobucket.com/albums/s652/Deaf3279/screenshot26_zpsrjw6p54f.png)
You should boost a MK 3 passenger cabin up there as a habitation module, it holds 16 kerbals. Looking good.

> 
> Well, What can I say? "Too bad"? Because, When I clicked image icon. It asked me for URL. I only know photobucket will give me url. I don't even have personal website to storage my image at. So, I'll keep use photobucket site til then.

It was not meant to be directed at you personally. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> You should boost a MK 3 passenger cabin up there as a habitation module, it holds 16 kerbals. Looking good.

There's MK 3 Passenger cabin? I gotta take look at build modular list again

> 
> Well, What can I say? "Too bad"? Because, When I clicked image icon. It asked me for URL. I only know photobucket will give me url. I don't even have personal website to storage my image at. So, I'll keep use photobucket site til then.

You can get image URLs by right-clicking an image and selecting so. Then paste it(CTRL+V or right-click>paste) on the URL Box.

> 
> You can get image URLs by right-clicking an image and selecting so. Then paste it(CTRL+V or right-click>paste) on the URL Box.

Yes, all my image is in photobucket

I think I'm done with this station. I cant think of something other to add to this station... 

![screenshot32_zpswwewfu3i.png](http://i1310.photobucket.com/albums/s652/Deaf3279/screenshot32_zpswwewfu3i.png)

By the way. Radar thing - i accident undock. I though it have "Pod" turn out it don't. I'm not going revert flight at all. Anything accident. They stays!

Man, you guys makes such cool looking stations! Whenever I try to plan out and build a station in space it looks like it was built by Beavers\*.

\*Beavers, good at dam building, terrible at space-station design.

On the topic of photobucket, I do tend to use it for everything (I've had a premium account there since forever). To the people having trouble with it... what issues do you see? If it's getting blocked by your work, do they not block imgur as well? Seems an odd security choice...

> 
> Look like I have to relearn everything all over start again. I didn't play this game for like 2 year now. I remember I used to going mun and minium many time. I even remember went to Duna once or twice. I even build a Massive station know as OASIS. But I forget most of thing how to play and how build rocket for mun. So I though to relearn start with build this mini station.
> [http://i1310.photobucket.com/albums/s652/Deaf3279/screenshot1_zpszwtnkpec.png](http://i1310.photobucket.com/albums/s652/Deaf3279/screenshot1_zpszwtnkpec.png)

This is nicer than any station I've ever put into orbit and I've played hundreds of hours. Very nice!

> 
> This is nicer than any station I've ever put into orbit and I've played hundreds of hours. Very nice!

Thanks ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I decide it's not done. I rid few habitat to make room for new station to add... could say station has upgrade replace old modular result:

[![screenshot3_zpsahfoenvz.png](http://i1310.photobucket.com/albums/s652/Deaf3279/screenshot3_zpsahfoenvz.png)](http://s1310.photobucket.com/user/Deaf3279/media/screenshot3_zpsahfoenvz.png.html)
